typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as short,
		voornaam as string,
		achternaam as string,
		geboortedatum as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> test1
source(output(
		ID as short,
		voornaam as string,
		achternaam as string,
		geboortedatum as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> test3
source(output(
		ID as short,
		voornaam as string,
		achternaam as string,
		geboortedatum as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> test2
test1, test3 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1, test2 union(byName: true)~> Union2
Union2 aggregate(groupBy(voornaam),
	each(match(name != 'voornaam'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate1
